meanings.definition: A film or television show featuring cowboys and the American West.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching oaters with my grandpa on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Many people find oaters to be exciting and full of adventure.
meanings.sent3: The oaters on TV always make me want to wear a cowboy hat around the house.
meanings.sent4: The classic oaters transport viewers to a time of dusty trails and showdowns.
meanings.sent5: The oaters paint a vivid picture of life in the Wild West.

meanings.definition: A genre of Western films or television shows.
meanings.sent1: My dad's favorite movie genre is oaters.
meanings.sent2: Oaters often showcase the rugged landscapes of the American West.
meanings.sent3: I never get tired of the old oaters with their dramatic gunfights.
meanings.sent4: The popularity of oaters peaked in the mid-20th century.
meanings.sent5: Watching oaters is like stepping back in time to the era of cowboys and outlaws.
